caption.p: Agents\Drugs recommended in the Guidelines (version 7) by the National Health Commission & State Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine for treatment of COVID-19.

tr.td: 200 mg/50 mg per pill for adults, two pills each time, twice a day, no longer than ten days.
500 mg intravenous injection for adults, 2–3 times per day, suggested being used jointly with IFN-α or lopinavir/ritonavir, no longer than ten days.
500 mg twice a day for a week for adults over 50 kg of body weight. 500 mg twice a day for the first and second day and 500 mg once a day for days 3–7 for adults with body weight below 50 kg.
200 mg three times per day for adults, no longer than ten days.
4–8 mg/kg (initial dose). 400 mg (recommended dose, infusion rate 1.66 ml/min) diluted with 0.9% normal saline to final makeup of 100 ml, not more than 2 infusions.
